revised_title: Advanced Methods of Energy Conversion: Magnetohydrodynamic Power Generation and Leakage Currents in Segmented Electrode Generators
tldr: This article discusses the advanced methods of energy conversion, specifically focusing on magnetohydrodynamic power generation and leakage currents in segmented electrode generators. The authors analyze three methods to study the effect of leakage currents and obtain the electrical characteristics of these generators. They also examine the shorting mechanism, which has been previously neglected in the field.
